name: The Trial of Kairos
description:
Game made for Brackey's Game Jam in August 2020.  The Game Jam theme was Rewind and lasted 7 days.

The Trial of Kairos is based on the idea of using your rewind ability to create the opportunity you need to complete stages and progress through the Trial. Unlike being able to control time this makes its user take into account their surroundings before using the abilities they have at their disposal for fear of attracting the Guardians of Time which will consume some of the users time should they catch them.

Your goal as the player is to turn on the switches in the room in their given order in order to progress through the Trials. Currently only 5 stages are available.
